Text.val: Originally copy of: ICA505C StatusFile AI Intercre

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/clnt INNER JOIN :2/CFLC ON CLNT101_ADMNO = CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED AND CLNT102_CLNTNO = CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED WHERE CFLC_ADMNO=:4 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:5 AND CFLC_USRID=':3' ORDER BY CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO FOR READ ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: dsql selects all allowed clients for client user .....
here we get some additional informatiuon about the selected clients ...
